medi:segment.name: Beginning of message
medi:segment.medi:documentation: BGM, To specify the function of the message, such as claim notification, assessment request, assessment report.

medi:segment.name: Attribute
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ATT, To specify the type of transaction within the specified message function.

medi:segment.name: Currencies
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CUX, To specify the currency of the transaction.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, To specify dates related to the transaction, such as the date processed.

medi:segment.name: Query and response
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QRS, To provide the response to coded questions related to the transaction.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, To provide additional text information related to the transaction, such as transaction description.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 1: A group of segments to specify parties related to the transaction communication together with any related references.

medi:segment.name: Party identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PNA, To specify one party related to the business transaction, such as message originator, ultimate recipient and software supplier.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 2: A group of segments to identify components of software used in the application system that created the business transaction contained within this message, together with any relevant dates.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, To provide a reference that identifies one software component provided by the software supplier together with the version of the software.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, To specify dates related to the software component, such as effective date and date applied to system.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 3: A group of segments to describe an event or incident that gave rise to the claim as well as the claim itself. One claim results from one major incident, but there may be many sub-incidents that need to be defined, e.g. during a storm there may be lightning damage, flood damage and fire damage caused by electrical short circuit etc.

medi:segment.name: Event
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EVE, To identify and describe one event or incident related to the claim.

medi:segment.name: Identity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IDE, To provide identification numbers for the incident which may be used to link the incident to specific items of damage.

medi:segment.name: Attribute
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ATT, To specify coded attributes relating to the incident, such as incident scale.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, To specify dates relating to the incident, such as incident date or start and end date when the incident occurred over a period of time.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, To specify references relating to the incident such as intermediary's claim reference, insurer's claim number.

medi:segment.name: Percentage details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCD, To specify percentages relating to the incident such as percentage of responsibility.

medi:segment.name: Query and response
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QRS, To specify the response to coded questions about the incident.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, To specify quantities relating to the incident, such as number of injured parties, number of witnesses.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, To provide text information about the incident, such as incident description.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 4: A group of segments to specify and describe the costs and charges relating to the incident.

medi:segment.name: Charge/rate calculations
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TCC, To specify one type of cost or charge relating to the incident.

medi:segment.name: Identity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IDE, To specify one type of cost or charge relating to the incident.

medi:segment.name: Attribute
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ATT, To specify coded attributes relating to the cost charge, such as method of calculation.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, To specify monetary amounts for the cost or charge, such as amount including tax, discount amount.

medi:segment.name: Percentage details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCD, To specify percentages relating to the cost or charge, such as tax percentage.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, To provide text information about the cost or charge, such as explanation of cost or charge.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 5: A group of segments to identify and describe contributions and/or recoveries relating to a cost or charge, and to identify who the recovery is to be made against.

medi:segment.name: Contribution details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COT, To identify one contribution or recovery relating to the cost or charge.

medi:segment.name: Identity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IDE, To specify the identity number of a party to whom this contribution or recovery applies.

medi:segment.name: Attribute
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ATT, To provide coded attributes relating to the contribution or recovery, such as contribution or recovery status.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, To specify monetary amounts relating to the contribution or recovery, such as amount of contribution to the cost charge.

medi:segment.name: Percentage details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCD, To specify percentages relating to the contribution or recovery, such as percentage of contribution to the cost charge.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, To specify references for the contribution or recovery.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, To provide text information about the contribution or recovery.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 6: FTX-SG7 To provide text information about the contribution or recovery.

medi:segment.name: Component details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COD, Provides a coded identification of one type of claim or incident component, such as policy cover, addresses.

medi:segment.name: Identity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IDE, To reference the object or party to which the cover applies.

medi:segment.name: Address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ADR, To specify a geographic limit on a policy cover, which may be expressed as a location, an address or a country or the address(es) of the incident.

medi:segment.name: Attribute
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ATT, To specify coded attributes related to the cover component, such as cover type, usage.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, To specify communication numbers for the address.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, To specify dates related to the cover, such as cover inception date, end date.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, To specify monetary amounts related to the cover, such as cover limit.

medi:segment.name: Percentage details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCD, To specify percentages related to the cover, such as cover index.

medi:segment.name: Query and response
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QRS, To specify the response to coded questions concerning the cover.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, To specify quantities related to the cover, such as number of claims allowed.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, To specify references related to the cover.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, To specify text information about the cover, such as cover description, usage description.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 7: A group of segments to describe the components relating to the cover which are used to calculate the claim.

medi:segment.name: Premium calculation component details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCC, To specify one type of component used in the claim calculation, such as excess, cover condition.

medi:segment.name: Attribute
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ATT, To specify coded attributes related to the claim calculation component, such as claim calculated by code.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, To specify dates relating to the claim calculation, such as condition valid date.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, To specify monetary amounts relating to the claim calculation, such as excess amount.

medi:segment.name: Percentage details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCD, To specify percentages related to the claim calculation component, such as excess percentage.

medi:segment.name: Query and response
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QRS, To specify the response to coded questions about the claim calculation component.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, To specify quantities relating to the claim calculation component.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, To provide text information about the claim calculation component, such as condition wording.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 8: A group of segments to specify and describe the costs and charges resulting from the claim calculation.

medi:segment.name: Charge/rate calculations
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TCC, To specify one type of cost or charge relating to the cover.

medi:segment.name: Identity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IDE, To reference the object or party that the cost or charge applies to.

medi:segment.name: Attribute
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ATT, To specify coded attributes relating to the claim calculation, such as method of calculation.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, To specify monetary amounts for the claim calculation component, such as cost or charge amount, discount amount.

medi:segment.name: Percentage details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCD, To specify percentages relating to the claim calculation component, such as cost or charge discount percentage.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, To provide text information about the claim calculation component, such as explanation of cost or charge.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 9: A group of segments to identify and describe contributions or recoveries relating to a claim calculation component.

medi:segment.name: Contribution details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COT, To identify one contribution or recovery relating to the claim calculation.

medi:segment.name: Identity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IDE, To reference a party to whom this contribution or recovery relates.

medi:segment.name: Attribute
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ATT, To provide coded attributes related to the contribution or recovery, such as contribution or recovery status.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, To specify monetary amounts related to the contribution or recovery, such as amount of contribution to the cost charge.

medi:segment.name: Percentage details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCD, To specify percentages relating to the contribution or recovery, such as percentage of contribution to the cost charge.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, To specify references relating to the contribution or recovery.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, To provide text information about the contribution or recovery.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 10: A group of segments to identify and describe the policy which is the subject of the claim.

medi:segment.name: Insurance cover description
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ICD, To identify the insurance product specified in the policy.

medi:segment.name: Identity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IDE, To provide identification numbers for the policy as specified by the intermediary, insurer and client.

medi:segment.name: Attribute
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ATT, To specify coded attributes related to the policy, such as policy product code, scheme code.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, To specify dates related to the policy, such as inception date, expiry date.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, To specify monetary amounts related to the policy, such as indemnity limit.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, To specify references related to the policy, such as policy number, policy wording version number.

medi:segment.name: Query and response
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QRS, To provide the response to coded questions relating to the policy.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, To provide text information related to the policy.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 11: A group of segments to identify and describe external documents relating to the claim. The information within this group describe the characteristics of the document not the content of the document.

medi:segment.name: Document/message details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DOC, To specify one type of document which is external to the message.

medi:segment.name: Identity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IDE, To reference a party or object to which the document relates.

medi:segment.name: Attribute
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ATT, To specify coded attributes relating to the document, such as document status code.

medi:segment.name: Address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ADR, To specify addresses relating to the document, such as place of issue.

medi:segment.name: External file link identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EFI, To specify a link to an external file that is related to the document.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, To specify references relating to the document, such as document reference, previous document reference.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, To specify dates relating to the document, such as date requested, date received.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, To specify monetary amounts relating to the document.

medi:segment.name: Query and response
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QRS, To specify the response to coded questions relating to the document.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, To specify quantities relating to the document, such as number of pages, number of copies.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, To provide text information about the document, such as document description.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 12: A group of segments to describe parties related to the claim, such as the insured, intermediary, insurer.

medi:segment.name: Party identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PNA, To identify one party related to a claim described within this message.

medi:segment.name: Identity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IDE, To specify identification numbers for the party which are used to link the party to other entities within the message.

medi:segment.name: Attribute
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ATT, To specify coded attributes related to the party, such as value added tax status code, marital status code.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, To specify dates related to the party, such as date of birth, date of death.

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, To provide measurements relating to the party, such as level of blood alcohol.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, To specify references related to the party, such as value added tax registration number.

medi:segment.name: Query and response
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QRS, To provide the response to coded questions about the party.

medi:segment.name: Percentage details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCD, To specify percentages related to the party, such as party proportion of risk.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, To provide text information relating to the party.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 13: RFF-FTX A group of segments to describe components relating to the party that may be used in validating the claim, such as addresses, employment, convictions, financial account.

medi:segment.name: Component details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COD, Provides a coded identification of one type of input or output component related to the party.

medi:segment.name: Identity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IDE, To provide identification numbers for the party component that may be used to link the component to other entities.

medi:segment.name: Address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ADR, To specify address details for a party.

medi:segment.name: Financial institution information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FII, To provide a set of financial account details for a party.

medi:segment.name: Attribute
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ATT, To specify coded attributes relating to the party component, such as offence code, type of blood alcohol test code.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, To provide communication details relating to a party component, such as telephone and fax numbers at address.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, To specify dates relating to the party component, such as start date at address, length of sentence.

medi:segment.name: Employment details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EMP, To provide one set of employment details for a party.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, To specify monetary amounts relating to the party component, such as fine amount.

medi:segment.name: Query and response
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QRS, To provide the response to coded questions relating to the party component.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, To specify quantities relating to the party component, such as total licence penalty points.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, To specify references relating to the party component, such as conviction reference, financial account number.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, To provide text information relating to the party component, such as offence description, employment description.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 14: RTE-FTX-SG15-SG17 A group of segments to describe the risk objects that are the subject of the claim.

medi:segment.name: Risk object type
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ROD, To identify one risk object that is the subject of the claim.

medi:segment.name: Identity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IDE, To provide identification numbers for the risk object that may be used to link the object to other entities within the message, such as cover.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, To specify reference numbers for the risk object, such as vehicle identification number, chassis number.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, To specify monetary amounts relating to the risk object, such as sum insured, replacement value.

medi:segment.name: Percentage details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCD, To specify percentages relating to the risk object.

medi:segment.name: Duty/tax/fee details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TAX, To specify tax/fee details relating to the risk object.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, To specify dates relating to the risk object, such as date first registered, date inspected.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, To specify a place/location related to the risk object.

medi:segment.name: Attribute
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ATT, To specify coded attributes relating to the risk object, such as body type code, nature of occupancy.

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, To specify measurements relating to the risk object, such as length, width, floor area.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, To specify quantities relating to the risk object, such as number of occupants, number of seats.

medi:segment.name: Query and response
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QRS, To provide the response to coded questions about the risk object.

medi:segment.name: Rate details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RTE, To specify rate details relating to the risk object.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, To provide text descriptions relating to the risk object, such as object description, business usage of building description.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 15: A group of segments to specify and describe the cost and charges relating to the risk object.

medi:segment.name: Charge/rate calculations
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TCC, To identify one charge or cost related to the risk object. To identify one charge or cost related to the risk object.

medi:segment.name: Identity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IDE, To reference a party to whom the charge relates.

medi:segment.name: Attribute
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ATT, To specify coded attributes relating to the cost or charge, such as method of calculation.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, To specify monetary amounts relating to the cost or charge, such as tax amount, discount amount.

medi:segment.name: Percentage details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCD, To specify percentages relating to the cost or charge.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, To provide text descriptions relating to the cost or charge.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 16: A group of segments to identify and describe contributions or recoveries relating to the risk object cost or charge.

medi:segment.name: Contribution details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COT, To identify one contribution or recovery related to the cost or charge.

medi:segment.name: Identity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IDE, To reference a party to whom this contribution or recovery relates.

medi:segment.name: Attribute
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ATT, To specify coded attributes relating to the contribution or recovery, such as contribution or recovery status code.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, To specify monetary amounts relating to the contribution or recovery, such as contribution or recovery amount.

medi:segment.name: Percentage details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCD, To specify percentages relating to the contribution or recovery, such as percentage of insurer's responsibility.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, To specify references relating to the contribution or recovery.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, To provide text descriptions relating to the contribution or recovery.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 17: QTY-RFF-FTX-SG18-SG20 A group of segments to describe components relating to the risk object and its assessment, such as address, part/task detail, loss/damage, valuation, security, interest.

medi:segment.name: Component details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COD, Provides a coded identification of one type of component related to the risk object.

medi:segment.name: Identity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IDE, To provide identification numbers for the risk object component which may be used to link the component to other entities.

medi:segment.name: Address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ADR, To specify addresses relating to the risk object.

medi:segment.name: Attribute
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ATT, To specify coded attributes relating to the risk object component, such as severity of damage code, security device code.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, To specify communication numbers for the address, such as telephone, fax numbers.

medi:segment.name: Damage
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DAM, To specify the damage to the risk object.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, To specify dates relating to the risk object component, such as start date at address.

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, To specify measurements relating to the risk object component.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, To specify monetary amounts relating to the risk object component, such as pre-incident value, resultant value.

medi:segment.name: Percentage details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCD, To specify percentages relating to the risk object component, such as percentage of under insurance, percentage of cost allocation.

medi:segment.name: Query and response
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QRS, To specify the response to coded questions relating to the risk object component.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, To specify quantities relating to the risk object component.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, To specify references relating to the risk object component.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, To provide text information for the risk object component, such as specialist valuation description, explanation of a video image.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 18: A group of segments to identify and describe costs and charges relating to the loss or damage.

medi:segment.name: Charge/rate calculations
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TCC, To identify one charge relating to the loss or damage.

medi:segment.name: Identity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IDE, To reference a party to whom this cost or charge relates.

medi:segment.name: Attribute
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ATT, To specify coded attributes relating to the cost or charge, such as method of calculation.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, To specify monetary amounts relating to the cost or charge component, such as tax amount, discount amount.

medi:segment.name: Percentage details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCD, To specify percentages relating to the cost or charge component, such as cost or charge discount percentage.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, To provide text information about the cost or charge component.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 19: A group of segments to identify and describe contribution and recovery details relating to the risk object component cost or charge.

medi:segment.name: Contribution details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COT, To identify one contribution or recovery component relating to the risk object component cost or charge.

medi:segment.name: Identity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IDE, To reference a party to whom this contribution or recovery relates.

medi:segment.name: Attribute
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ATT, To specify coded attributes relating to the contribution or recovery component, such as contribution or recovery status code.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, To specify monetary amounts relating to the contribution or recovery component, such as contribution or recovery amount.

medi:segment.name: Percentage details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCD, To specify percentages relating to the contribution or recovery component, such as percentage of insurer's liability.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, To provide references relating to the contribution or recovery component.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, To provide text information about the contribution or recovery component.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 20: SG21 A group of segments to identify and describe part or task details relating to the risk object loss/damage component.

medi:segment.name: Item description
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IMD, To identify one part or task that relates to the risk object loss/damage component.

medi:segment.name: Identity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IDE, To reference a party that relates to this part or task such as service provider.

medi:segment.name: Attribute
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ATT, To specify coded attributes relating to the part or task item, such as paint system code, category of labour code.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, To specify dates relating to the part or task item, such as task/service start date.

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, To specify measurements relating to the part or task item, such as tyre pressure, tyre tread depth.

medi:segment.name: Percentage details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCD, To specify percentages relating to the part or task.

medi:segment.name: Query and response
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QRS, To specify the response to coded questions about the part or task item.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, To specify quantities relating to the part or task.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, To specify references relating to the part or task.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, To provide text information relating to the part or task, such as evidence of personal injury.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 21: A group of segments to identify and describe costs and charges relating to a part or task item.

medi:segment.name: Charge/rate calculations
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TCC, To identify one charge related to the part or task item.

medi:segment.name: Identity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IDE, To reference a party to whom this cost or charge relates.

medi:segment.name: Attribute
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ATT, To specify coded attributes relating to the cost or charge, such as method of calculation.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, To specify monetary amounts relating to the cost or charge component, such as tax amount, discount amount.

medi:segment.name: Percentage details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCD, To specify percentages relating to the cost or charge component, such as cost or charge discount percentage.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, To provide text information about the cost or charge component.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 22: A group of segments to identify and describe contribution and recovery details related to the risk object component cost or charge.

medi:segment.name: Contribution details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COT, To identify one contribution or recovery component relating to the risk object cost or charge.

medi:segment.name: Identity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IDE, To reference a party to whom this contribution or recovery relates.

medi:segment.name: Attribute
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ATT, To specify coded attributes relating to the contribution or recovery component, such as contribution or recovery status code.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, To provide monetary amounts relating to the contribution or recovery component, such as contribution or recovery amount.

medi:segment.name: Percentage details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCD, To specify percentages relating to the contribution or recovery component, such as percentage of insurer's responsibility.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, To specify references relating to the contribution or recovery component.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, To provide text information relating to the contribution or recovery component.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 23: A group of segments to identify and describe an action relating to the claim, such as assessment, financial settlement, progress report.

medi:segment.name: Process identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PRC, To identify one action related to the claim.

medi:segment.name: Identity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IDE, To reference parties related to the claim.

medi:segment.name: Attribute
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ATT, To specify coded attributes relating to the action, such as assessment report type, manner of settlement.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, To specify dates related to the action, such as date of report, date inspection to be performed.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, To specify monetary amounts related to the action, such as settlement amount.

medi:segment.name: Query and response
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QRS, To provide the response to coded questions about the action.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, To specify references related to the action, such as instructor's assessment reference, assessor's assessment reference.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, To provide text information about the action, such as progress description, verdict description.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 24: A group of segments to describe the previous insurance history for the risk associated with this claim. The previous insurance is expressed as a sequence of periods of insurance.

medi:segment.name: Sequence details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: SEQ, Identifies the sequence of this period of previous insurance.

medi:segment.name: Identity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IDE, To reference parties related to this period of insurance history.

medi:segment.name: Attribute
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ATT, To specify coded attributes relating to the previous insurance history, such as policy class.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, To specify dates relating to the period of insurance history, such as inception date, expiry date.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, To specify references relating to the period of previous insurance history, such as policy number.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 25: A group of segments to identify and describe components relating to the period of previous insurance history, such as prior loss.

medi:segment.name: Component details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COD, To identify one prior loss that relates to the period of previous insurance.

medi:segment.name: Identity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IDE, To reference party numbers for the prior loss as specified by the intermediary, insurer and client.

medi:segment.name: Attribute
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ATT, To specify coded attributes relating to the prior loss, such as loss type, incident type.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, To specify dates relating to the prior loss, such as loss date, settlement date.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, To specify monetary amounts relating to the prior loss, such as loss amount.

medi:segment.name: Query and response
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QRS, To specify the response to coded questions relating to the prior loss.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, To specify references for the prior loss, such as insurer�s historical claim reference.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, To provide free text about the prior loss, such as prior loss description.
